attributes.action: The F.A. to look into and punish clubs for breaching Football rules
attributes.additional_details:
Teams such as Birmingham City have been punished for breaching football rules.
Bigger and richer clubs should not be able to get away with it
attributes.background: The F.A. must look into and punish Football teams such as Manchester City by deducting them points if they are found guilty of breaching F.A. and Uefa rules.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on the FA to take action.
